column4: Is there a way to make bins turn into isos without the cue-file?
it is not in the repos
the linux link on that page is broken :( I'll just google for it
wget http://users.andara.com/~doiron/bin2iso/bin2iso19b.c && gcc -o bin2iso bin2iso19b.c && sudo mv bin2iso /usr/bin
Hmmm it can't find io.h during the gcc part
Got it compiled nicely now. Just waiting to see wether it works or not
correction: Wether my file is a real bin or whatever it is :)
you coud always just open it up in a hex editor to see what format it is in
something like hexdump -C myfile.bin from cli, or use ghex2 to open it up in a GUI
Cool. I'll experiment some with that. I've always been hexadecimally challenged but I'd like to try it on :)
